highlights: Contributed to major refactor effort for Coach , Slack app for helping workplace communication.
Revamped entire database with new tables & re-designing our automated message scheduling system.
Developed central Areto account system to connect various services.
Worked on porting Probot, twitter sentiment analysis bot, to other social medias and investigating their APIs.
Worked on a Geo-mapping web application for managing trailer inventory on construction site. Set up an audit log system, and wrapped up the project for final delivery.
Developed and delivered a flexible questionnaire system for commercial use with an easily extensible questionnaire database.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers in researching user requirements, stakeholder interview and developing end-user interfaces.

projects.name: Perf-Agent (Open-Source)
projects.description: Contributed to the development of a tool for collecting Eclipse OpenJ9's runtime performance utilizing JVMTI for JVM metrics, and perf for system level metrics. Developed in C++, the core for the collection server, the network client that gathered metrics, and capturing of verbose GC logs.

projects.name: Kagi
projects.description: A lightweight B+Tree-based on-disk key-value store implemented from scratch in Go.

projects.name: Pinbooru
projects.description: A dead-simple image board, where users can create posts with multiple images.
